Reviews.Title: This Samsung TV is Great
Reviews.Author: Dennis William Hawkins
Reviews.Content: THis is my first Samsung TV, prior I had mainly brought Toshiba TV'S.  I brought this Samsung due to a sales special and I am well pleased.  The picture is great, sound very good.  Overall Excellent TV.  ANd the price was good!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Bob Coaker
Reviews.Content: Incredible picture, perfect size for my large room and wall. Happy I chose this brand and model. Great deal for the money I spent

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: Komal Khan
Reviews.Content: I had an LG before but the picture is so much better. Enhances your watching experience; Great additions to our new place!

Reviews.Title: excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Carlos  Aldana
Reviews.Content: great video qualitygreat sound qualitycontrol menu display could be a little more user-friendly but is really goodGreat pricei totally recomend it!!!

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: K. Geiger
Reviews.Content: This TV has really great picture and was really easy to set up. Fits really well in our living room. sound is pretty good for out of the box stock speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Christine Manning
Reviews.Content: I bought this during a President's Weekend sale.  Was easy to order on Amazon, and was able to schedule my delivery date and time window.Great, clear picture.  Looks real.  Sports are even better to watch on it.  The best is there is barely any frame to the picture, so it's all screen, so looks even bigger.  It feels slightly flimsy on the stand, but I called Samsung and they said it was supposed to be that way to have a little give.I purchased it for $799, no shipping charge on Amazon or anything.  And it was listed as a $1400 TV, so for the price, can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: WOW,,,,,,,
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: What a picture this TV has !!!! I was just blown away by it...... The TV I had before was a Samsung 40 inch. So I knew how good Samsung was before hand. And I knew I wanted bigger. But what I didn't know, was how good LED was. My 40 inch was not, so this LED HDTV is just soooooooooo amazing to me. LOVE IT !!!! And the price was good for this TV too. Very happy with my purchase !!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung 55 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Holly G
Reviews.Content: Wonderfull..i have not had a new TV since 1999. What a difference a decade makes...Holy smokes..the picture is awesome..the sound is great..the price was great..the delivery...packaging was also very good..This was the best Amazon purchase I have made yet.

Reviews.Title: great! wait sorry... less than
Reviews.Author: I. Fraser "lazy, and slightly uninspired"
Reviews.Content: this is a amazing television. Really clear picture and great refresh rate~!replaced my 720 51inch plasma and i could not ask for more from this tvUPDATEI have had this TV for over four months and am now faced with a wide array of issuesthe screen is starting to lose pixelsthe image is fragmenting around objectsthere is blurring in patches around solid objects during motionand the screen is losing clarity way too fastall in all this tv started off strong and ended as a sub-par model with not even enough quality to last more than 4 months

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Used it for a week now and mounted it on the wall with no issues.  We had a projection HD tv before which was great but the images are so crisp on this it almost seems unreal (too life-like).  It makes movies and tv shows almost seem like they were shot with a home camera.  I am sure there is a setting to tone things down.  Still 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but lacking a few features
Reviews.Author: C$
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV a few weeks ago when my 10 year old rear projection tv bit the dust. No problem with delivery although that sounds like it can be hit or miss.  The unit itself has a good picture quality, noticeably better than my previous TV with the Xbox360 and an HDMI cable.  I was impressed with the sound I get out of the unit's factory speakers as well.  I am not an audio/videophile and would say I am an above average joe when it comes to electronics.  If you want this unit for just general use (TV,gaming, movies) and you are not an audio/videophile, then will probably be a good unit for you.The main reasons I bought this TV:-It is not a smart TV.  You can save money if you get a unit without that feature.  Plus, most Blu-Ray players have that feature built in.  No point in redundancy.-It is not a 3D TV.  Personally I don't want anything to do with 3D technology.  I usually do not see movies in 3D at the theater so why would I want to see them at home?  Plus the jury is still out on how good or not 3D is for your vision (last time I heard)A few things that have aggravated me about this unit which caused me to rate 4/5:Only 2 HDMI cable slots.  Granted I can live with it and if need be I could always get a HDMI splitter or a receiver if I ever want/need to add more than 2 HD devices to the unit.Only 1 SHARED AV/Component cable hook up- This is a bit of a pain if you have 2 of anything that isn't full HD (example would be a DVD player and a Nintendo Wii).  You will have to switch the plugs depending on which device you want to use at that point in time.The menu is quiet extensive and navigation can be a pain but I have only tweaked a few settings and I didn't have a problem finding what I needed.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Brenda Laspee
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product. Just take out of the box and plug it in. Of course your settings are preeset. I just added a little brightness and perfect.I have a large picture window in the room and it doesn't affect the picture still bright. The old TV was hard to see when the sun came in the window.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes the best TVs.  The picture quality on this TV is awesome.  I've checked out or owned many different TV brands and I've been sticking with Samsung for the past 5 years.  For now, they are still the best in my opinion.  You get what you pay for and I know that Samsung is on the pricier side of the market but they are well worth the price.  It's always a good idea to wait for a sale.

Reviews.Title: Best Overall Value for Amazing Price
Reviews.Author: Westerville OH
Reviews.Content: You cannot find a better picture for the price.  The 240 Motion beats any 3D.Exceeds expectations.  Everyone that sees the picture is amazed.

Reviews.Title: Amazing display & set up!
Reviews.Author: Gena
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this TV after researching it for awhile. I'm very impressed with the display and how it looks. The guys who delivered it, set it up with no problem and were very pleasant. The whole experience was great, highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: 55" TV
Reviews.Author: DI
Reviews.Content: So far it is exactly what I wanted and expected. The picture is excellent and the sound OK without a sound board.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Lawrence E. Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price. The picture and sound are great, and fine tuning is very easy.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: HeySean "sb"
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing! It's almost like things are 3D, my five (5) year old grandson said, "Now I can have my friends over for a play date to watch TV."

Reviews.Title: So nice I bought two!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Bought one for $1250 and $800, respectively. Absolutely cannot beat it at this price point. I would recommend the Cheetah Mount for $28 that comes with the level and HDMI cable, too.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV.
Reviews.Author: Michael Norton. "Michael"
Reviews.Content: This TV has both amazingly deep black levels and vibrant colors. Picture quality is outstanding and even the sound is very good for a flat panel TV. I was very close to buying a Plasma but since this TV is on cable news and weather during typical afternoon viewing I decided to go with an LED model to avoid image retention. After hours of researching I found this model on the AVS forums with great reviews. It also fit my $1000 or less budget and size requirements.Be aware there is a panel lottery with this as well as most flat screen televisions. My 55" is a version TH02 meaning it has a Samsung manufactured S-PVA panel. The Samsung S-PVA panels have the best viewing angles, black levels and color reproduction. If you get a Samsung made panel your set will have either a TSxx or THxx listed as the version number. There is an UNxxEH60xx owners thread on the AVS forums that will explain panel types and manufactuers. I believe Sharp makes all the 60" panels.Overall this TV is amazing for the price and does not force gimmicky 3D I will never use on you or include apps that I use my Blu Ray player for anyway. It's just a really good bare bones TV. It allows for a very high level of calibration and since no two panels or viewing environments are the same I recommend at the least trying a calibration DVD. You can download one for free by googling "AVS HD 709 - Blu-ray & MP4 Calibration". There is also a very good Disney calibration disk. This TV is good enough in my opinion to be professionally calibrated as well if you are unsure of doing it yourself or if you just want the best picture possible.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Room with Windows
Reviews.Author: shogundad "Big Al"
Reviews.Content: The picture is great with room that has sunlight entering it.  I prefer better sound so I may add some speakers.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: mrmiles
Reviews.Content: I only had one problem and it was hooking it to my stereo but turns out, the digital output on the back works like a head phone Jack so Yeah, great surround.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: BC
Reviews.Content: I have to admit. I was very skeptical of this tv. I had a panasonic plasma before and it was awesome. When I first hung it, I was a little disappointed. However, after tweaking the picture settings, I am very pleased. I have a receiver that runs my whole entertainment system so I didn't need all the bells and whistles that the higher end televisions had. Overall, if you are an extreme obsessive compulsive person, my plasma tv picture was a little better. But for the price of this TV, it can't be beat. Nothing wrong with the picture unless you are really trying to find something. Also runs way cooler than my plasma. Would definitely buy this tv again, except I would have gotten the 60 in. instead of the 55 in.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing computer monitor with great back light uniformity!
Reviews.Author: Ryald
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for an HDTV to use as my computer monitor to play video games and watch movies on. I have bought many different TVs and I have had so many issues with them so far until I got this amazing beast.The most important thing for me is having dark black colors with no annoying uniformity issues (white back light bleeding through areas it's not supposed to). I have returned two other TV to amazon and one to BestBuy because of low quality issues.If you're looking for a super huge, extremely high quality TV to that you can use to play Skyrim on than look no further. This thing is perfect, you will not regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: We love this TV - nice sound, sharp clear picture, everything we wanted! I works well. First LED HD TV that we ever purchased. We spent 2 weeks researching. Not disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Brent W Hannigan
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 55" LED model replaces a long lived Samsung DLP TV and for under a thousand dollars it is a great deal. I think the Auto Motion feature is very stupid and ruins the look of movies so I turned that off. The picture is vibrant but the contrast does fade if you are not directly in front. All in all an excellent product so far and we are all very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This thing rocks. It is a little thicker than the average slim models now. You do not need a smart TV. The sheen on the screen is a low gloss type that I love in an area with a bright window coming in from an angle. Find someone else' settings posted online. There are web sites with exact setting that worked out for people or just try one reviewer in here. His settings worked perfect for me here. Get Eco settings off. If not, the thing dims to a bad contrasty state and back to a bright, beautiful saturated, color popping screen then back again. Simple fix. If you lose power to the unit. you may have to do that again. Pretty funny watching my Son play XBox and see him throw a fit when it dimmed down. Samsung has a winner here in the mid range prices. It can't be beat. Their capacitor issues are a thing of the past. Fantastic picture and the speed is fine for the fastest moving action. No need for a better TV. This thicker LED does not use edge lighting LED technology. The thinner ones bleed light with the flash light effect in the corners on dark movies. Buy a 100 dollar range Blu-Ray player that handles all movie codecs and has a nice wireless smart phone app to act as a remote and you can sit there and pause a movie with your phone instead of the player's remote. Got an Onkyo 7.1 surround sound. No issues with dropping out video with Xbox as others had. You just buy the newer fast HDMI cables that are real inexpensive on Amazon and you are good to go. This only has two side HDMI ports but the way I hook everything up to the surround sound, we only have one HDMI line going into the side as it is. I use a 45 degree angle HDMI adapter and have the line snaking down the inside of the wall like the other wires. You can be on the side and will not notice that abrupt turn that disappears behind the TV. I used picture wire and two screws to hang it as flat as can be. A few lopps of it and braided. It is on a heavy duty screw that is recessed a bit into a solid wood stud. I can move the TV like a picture to make it level. Really beats back the thick body issue doing that. It sits flat on the wall and has no mountto make it protrude more. Some mounts ahve these slim models jutting out more than my unit and the way I mounted it. Only one screw holding it. A very thick one. I trust it. Great deal. The 60 inch version is now less than 100 dollars more in price than what this 55 inch one was a month ago. Get a smart Blu-Ray player because if you do it that way you have a smart phone remote for controlling what plays and some players allow you to see what is on your smart phone, on the big TV here. For instance, I think a Samsung phone has the same anynet proprietary linking up of the two devices straight to their branded TV and Blu-Ray player. If you are new to TV's and want bells and whistles, go pay twice as much. If not, get this unit while you can. You do not need 3D. It is a novelty. Everyone I know does not use built in web apps on the TV after they purchase one and they wind up taking off the 3D mode that is on their unit because it has what they call that "Soap opera affect" during movement. A few friends like my low sheen screen over t heir models high gloss one and the picture quality is better they say as soon as they walk into my living room. Get it. BTW, the huge white glove box that it came in was comical. It really did protect it but wow, it was about the same weight as the TV and gave me a lot of cardboard to recycle. Huge box with the regular box inside. I had no idea that it came with that added shipping benefit. Amazing purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Matthew Fielder
Reviews.Content: My Father purchased this to upgrade from a rear projection HD TV. The picture quality is amazing on this thing. The audio lacks but this is normal for most flat screens, sound bar or surround will resolve that. Don't get me wrong though the audio isn't horrible by any means, just lacks bass and such. Bottom bezel mount feels like its on the cheap side and wish it were bulky like most of the mounts that ship with Samsungs. Still feels sturdy enough to get the job done though, I just happen to like that super heavy piece of glass on the bottom that most of their newer TVs ship with.Picture quality is amazing to say the very least with this unit and with minimal reflection during daytime use. Would of course be worse if plasma with glass but not the case here. My only gripe is that you cannot set an aspect ratio per say that will stretch 4:3 ratio without making 16:9 look blown up. I wish this had the ability to decipher between the two on its own or in the settings. So with a 4:3 ratio when set to 16:9 you will get letter box on the sides unless you change settings to fit to screen etc. If anyone knows a way around this let me know with a comment. This is the only reason for a 4 star rating, nothing to do with picture quality or build quality. Just wish it did this automatically as my Father isn't good with the settings on these things.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: starter01
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and looks a little better than my plasma when it comes to HD, but overall it still can't beat out my Panasonic GT-25 5o inch.  I don't have to worry about burn-in or image retention, plus uses less energy. Caught it on sale for $879 and it hasn't gone down to that price since.  I really like this TV, plus a friend of mine brought his a few days before I got mine. I checked it out at his house, he has Direct TV and it looked great there so I had to get it.  Mine is hooked up to my Comcast HD box and this is my first Samsung.  I have 2 Panasonic Plasma's, one LG, one older Sony and know this TV.  I like getting items through Amazon when they are the shipper, I have zero issues in about 5 years.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Honeybee
Reviews.Content: It's hard to beat Samsung's picture - great clarity. Love this TV. I opted to buy a basic TV in lieu of a smart TV until the manufacturers work out the bugs in them. When reading the reviews, it seems some customers were annoyed with pop-ups, etc. so I stuck with a basic TV and I do not have any regrets. This TV is awesome in every respect. I also opted for the backlit option over edge-lit as many reviews talked about ghosting on the edge-lit models. I'll wait until all that is perfected but for now I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Great HDTV tv for a great price.  Did not want a 3d tv.  This tv fit our needs would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy my choice in this TV
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: I looked over the other reviews,also read about the ratings of this model and am happy with my decision. We only have an antena for our local stations the picture is great, sound is good, and the controls are easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This Samsung has, by far,  the best picture I've ever had. I'm very glad I made this selection and look forward to watching it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Need I say More!
Reviews.Author: Jens Beck
Reviews.Content: Pretty clear picture, even on regular old beta tapes or DVD the clarity is really close to the feeling of being physically present as you watch the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Ddigler
Reviews.Content: Great tv for movies. Worth the price. Sound is excellent. I had it shipped and everything worked perfectly. Picture is clear.  I would recommend led over plasma

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: John Guy
Reviews.Content: An excellent tv for the money. It is not a smart tv but it does all tv stuff just fine including hooking to your stereo speakers.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the BEST!!!
Reviews.Author: Anita Price
Reviews.Content: We have been looking to buy a HD TV for a while, I had done my homework on different brands, refresh rates, LED vs LCD or Plasma... No regrets on our choice!!! I still can't get over how clear and perfect the picture is.

Reviews.Title: Great LED for the money
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Not as SUPER-THIN as some LEDs ive seen but worth the price.  Crisp picture and great color.  Lack of lip allows for a bigger screen size.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: After 1 month of use the TV is flawless. Delivery was prompt and handled efficiently and professionally. TV was checked by the delivery personnel prior to my acceptance.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Dario Schiappa
Reviews.Content: Everything about the purchase, installation, operation, and performance capabilities was great, and all at a decent price. I highly recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, bright, colorful ... USB port is great
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is great.  The colors are bright and bold with alot of punch!  If you want a nice big screen TV with a great picture but without 3D and without "smart" features, you will be satisfied with this one.  I love the USB port on the side.  I have plugged in an external hard drive and played video files (AVI and MP4) as well as picture files (JPG).  Some people are dissappointed about having only 2 HDMI connections, but I think its adequate.  If you are trying to set up a home theatre system with alot of different components to plug in, you will probably want a higher end TV anyhow.

Reviews.Title: Easy to navigate
Reviews.Author: BOBBY J. BOLDEN
Reviews.Content: I chose the Samsung UNEH6000 55-inch 1080p 102Hz LED HDTV because of its pricing and samsungs reputation for turning out quality televisions,I would recommend it to a friend because it has a beautiful picture and easy to use remote control.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: md1968
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great televisions and this is no exception.  Easy set-up, fit on my existing wall mount and best of all has a tremendous picture.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for this price
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: You cannot get a better TV from a better brand for the price I got on 2012 thanksgiving and that is final! If you are like me, and don't fancy the advanced features (which wont work half the time anyways) like DLNA, Smart TV, slim design etc, then you are not missing out on anything. The picture clarity is great, the menu options are elaborate, it pumps out picture at 240 Hz - its not like you are compromising anything because of the price (for what a TV is meant to do).  I'm glad there are no supposedly smart features to get in the way when I hook it up with an A/V processor as a part of a home theater system. Peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: No complaints.Pro:-delivered on time-setup easy- display and the smart features really good.Cons:-Doing the price matching.Conclusion:- I have always had good luck and quality with Samsung TVs. Would recommend to friends this type brand. I currently own 3 Samsung TVs.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Dave Lawton
Reviews.Content: Great picture and price, wish it had 3 or 4 HDMI inputs as I had to be an internal switcher to have regularTV, Apple TV and PS3 connected.

Reviews.Title: Works excellently, one big concern
Reviews.Author: Xiao Ma
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about TVs. I don't mess with the contrast/sharpness, etc etc. I just want a good TV that's sleek and high quality. I got it with this TV. This product has everything I want in a TV and I know how to do everything with ease. I have no complaints about the product itself.However, I ran into a problem while installing this TV. The screws they give you to hook the TV up to the stand are all the same size and length. However, two of the screw holes going into the TV from the stand seem to be too big. The screws just "fall in" and I can't figure out how to undo this because according to the instructions and my own eyes, every screw is identical. I'm worried that the TV will fall or break off the stand, although technically it shouldn't unless someone pulls the screws out. For this I took off one star. I wanted to give this item a 5 star rating but after checking and re-checking the screws, there seems to be no clear answer.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Archer557
Reviews.Content: Very clean picture, fast action scenes are not blurred and video games look Amazing, Money well spent. Movie night has now moved to my house because of this tv lol

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN55EH6000 LED TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received this TV so things could change but I feel compelled to write on behalf of Samsung TV's.  I also have a 50 inch 1080/60hz LCD which I purchased in December of 2009.  This television has a beautiful picture and has been consistently reliable since day one.  I did purchase the extended warranty but so far have not needed to use it. I did not purchase the extended warranty this time because the cost of the TV was so reasonable $799 and TVs keep costing less and less. My point is that people complain that after 18 months something fails on the TV and Samsung won't help them, hello, the warranty is for one year, regardless of the problem, if you want a longer warranty you have to buy one.  I love the picture quality of this TV and thanks to some of the other folks I was able to adjust my settings with ease.  I hope to have the same good fortune with this Samsung as I have had with my previous TV and my Samsung Bluray player as well, but should the TV have issues two years down the road, then shame on me for not buying the extended warranty, not shame on Samsung.  Anyway, so as not to upset anyone, this model has a beautiful picture, two HDMI ports, which are adequate for me and I added a sound bar since these TV's are not noted for their wonderful sound quality.  I purchased this TV from Amazon and the delivery did not go well.  They were six hours late.  Amazon graciously agreed to refund me $48.00 for time wasted, so I purchased this TV for $752 which is an awesome price.  I love Amazon, they are the best.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Picture
Reviews.Author: C20lbbass
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 2 year old 52" Toshiba that blew its screen even though connected to a APC battery back up with surge protection. The picture on this set is awesome, truly stunning compared with the previous set. Blu-Ray is phenomenal. The factory setting on the back lighting was a little too intense (12 of 12)so I knocked it down to 6, but other than that no changes were made. Set up was simple, 20 min from out of the box to picture, mind the stand, it should be flush with the set. Only 2 HDMI ports which may be a problem for some folks. Of course Amazon and their partners did a wonderful with the order fulfillment, the correct product delivered on time. Lets hope longevity is one of its strong suits, these things aren't cheap.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Phil McTighe
Reviews.Content: I was a bit hesitant buying this tv because of the amount of money and how it is my first HDTV.I was not let down, its great and amazing. I work in TV and I am impressed with the quality and size.Havent had any problems and has been working great and everyone who comes over loves it!I would recommend it to anyone. Great TV

Reviews.Title: Just what I had been looking for!
Reviews.Author: Jason E Kindred
Reviews.Content: I had been researching for a while for a new TV.  I was going to get a 50" Sony this spring, but the price went up and I noticed this 55" Samsung for just $800.  The reviews I had read put it in the "good, but not great catagory."  Still, a lot of them were written when the TV cost $300-$400 more.  So I thought I was getting a good deal.  So far it has worked out!  It was very easy to install on my wall mount and I love the picture.  I did have to do some adjusting to ditch the "soap opera effect."  I tried it out with it on, but I ended up almost making my wife and I dizzy (we tried it on Disney blu-ray.)  Other than that, no problems.  I love the colors.  Even the black is well represented in my opinion.  I just wish I had more HD programming avaible in my area.

Reviews.Title: Arrived with problem
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We were really excited to receive our new tv. The picture quality is great. The hookup was easy. The TV is light weight and the features and controls are great. The only problem is that the tv has a red line down the middle of it. I called Samsung and apparently this is  known problem. They are sending out a repairman. I like the TV but I'm disappointed that out of the box the tv needs repair. This is my 2nd Samsung TV. The first also had a failure. Also a known problem. I'm starting to wonder if I should stop buying Samsung products. If you buy this tv make sure you buy the 4 year warranty on it. Unfortunately it sounds like you will need it..

Reviews.Title: Best HDTV for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: The quality of the HDTV is great.  It's easy to use.  It's light in weight. We've had this less than a month but know we'll enjoy this for years to come!

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Kalyan Thapa
Reviews.Content: As my headline states, it is a great product for the price I bought it for. Although there are other high end Samsung LED TVs out there ( better than this one), but I am happy for what I paid for.Pros:  Better pricedCons: Heavy and thick ( Don't get fooled by LED. Although this TV is LED, this is a thick TV and is heavy). No Internet Appps, Wifi, and all those nice to have ones.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME HDTV
Reviews.Author: D-D
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love our Samsung 55" HDTV!  The picture and sound quality is awesome!!  The price for this TV is great too!!!  We also found the perfect stand for it :-)

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable picture!!
Reviews.Author: Stephen M. Bowers "VW lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on black Friday and got a killer price.  Compared to my 5yr. old Sony LCD TV this Samsung blows it clear out of this universe.  The colors and picture clarity are astonishing.  I think this tv was a very wise investment for the money!!Very impressed!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Valdez
Reviews.Content: I got this TV from best buy which price matched Amazon's black friday offer.cnet does not give it a great score but I love the fact that it has very small black sides so I got it anyway. cnet is wrong. I like this TV more than the vizio one. And for the price it is a good deal

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Joe Baby
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal, however Best Buy is selling it for $847. Doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, but it has a great picture and does what it needs to do!

Reviews.Title: Misleading Refresh Rate in the title
Reviews.Author: MiiHiiR
Reviews.Content: Note that the actual Refresh Rate for this TV is 120Hz. They're advertising it as 240Hz which is the Clear Motion Rate - it's NOT a standard, but a marketing gimmick by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: not up to par
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: I decided to get this tv after lots of good reviews..i will say its not a bad tv..but it just does not have the detail of some other models..i was upgrading from a 46 inch sony..the sony was bought 2 months ago..and i will say the picture quality on the sony blew away the samsung..the fine detail on the sony was far superior and was a joy to watch..where as the samsung was good but the clarity and detail was just not up to the sonys level..sad to say after all that i am returning the tv tomorrow it just was not woth the price..i would much rather watch the smaller sony with a more crisp and vibrant and better picture..i do want a bigger tv and will get one but i have had awesome luck with sony and will stay with them..if i had the 55 inch sony with the same picture quality as the 46 inch in the same price range it would blow this samsung 55 inch away easily...just do research before you buy..cause the hassle of returning something is stressful and disappointing..

Reviews.Title: Excellent as monitor-type TV, but not perfect.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Park
Reviews.Content: I got this basic hdtv without smart features and only 2 HDMI inputs because my system is highly planned.  I connect a Mac mini HTPC, all the current game consoles, a Blu-ray player, and a gaming PC, all through a switching A/V receiver.  For this kind of setup it is the right choice for the price.  The picture is fantastic (very very slight darkness noticeable at edges due to backlighting type, otherwise wonderful), and it has enough options to make the picture just right.  Even though I don't need it, 2 HDMI is just baffling... and could always limit your choices.  Buy this "dumb" tv instead of the more expensive "smart tvs" if you have it connected to smart equipment like I do.  I access my music, watch internet tv, play games, etc. all in 55" grandeur.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy $800, Amazon $877, Price Match NOT guaranteed by Azn.
Reviews.Author: fs
Reviews.Content: this tv gets great reviews EXCEPT that it'll prob. be discontinued in 2013 (MY OPINION) as there are not many "features" compared to other brands in this price range/size, etc.THUS, these Samsungs are being heavily promoted/discounted this 'holiday' season. so, depends on the bells and whistles u want.Ex.: it's not a SMART tv. (i'm not really sure what that is yet!)Amazon's price guarantee is NOT as it seems!! they really just "want to know of lower prices".Best Buy has $800 starting this week (black friday) and u don't have to wait for it to ship.JMO.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: R. K. Moreland
Reviews.Content: I didn't need a "smart" TV and I have a 40 " Samsung that I really enjoy. That ended up in the bedroom. That was an LCD unit and I really think the picture on the LCD is better. Though the 40" had an inherent electrical flaw that I found out about later. I think I shopped much harder for the 40" unit, as I don't think the picture on the LED is as good. I may have made a different choice had I done all the running around comparing pictures as I did the first time around.

Reviews.Title: Good picture. Great.
Reviews.Author: jongbhak
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV. No issues at all. I like  it. It is on a wall with a wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Niiiiice TV
Reviews.Author: Chris Campbell
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased so far with this TV.  I've had it for little over a month now.  I can't complain.  Picture quality is very good.  Takes a little time to get your preferential settings set.  Seems like a no brainer to at least put an ethernet port on this model, but I didn't make it.

Reviews.Title: Little Early for Evaluation
Reviews.Author: L. N. Hardin ""Old Guy""
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted:  great picture, sound is OK, easy setup.  The overall quality seems to be a little better than a comparable Vizio I owned previously.  I would like more HD ports as they seem to go bad often.  I do not use it for anything other than television programming--no computer use, gaming.etc.  My concern for any of these televisions is durability.  The Vizio, of similar size, lasted exactly three years.  All of the televisions I have had in the past have lasted much longer.  It is too early to judge the important factor of durability as I have only owned it for about a month.  I cannot tell any difference in the sound quality of the two televisions, although a near deaf person cannot qualify as an expert in this area.  As a matter of fact I am not an expert in any area--I just watch it.  This one works for me.  I would recommend it to a friend.I had some difficulty with the shippers, JB HUNT.  They only deliver to our area one day per week.  I missed a phone call from them on a Monday and my answering machine was turned off.  They deliver on Tuesdays.  Around noon on Monday  information was in my Amazon account that JB HUNT had tried to contact me.  I called them twice and only spoke to machines.  I contacted Amazon who helped straighten things out  ( I was impressed).  The shipment was one week late. Amazon refunded  me fifty dollars for my trouble.  One important piece of advice:  If you have the delivery people unpack your television--DO NOT let them take the boxes with them as they may have parts stored in the styrofoam packing material.  All of the screws and part of the stand are probably there and lost in the vastness of a JB HUNT dump.  Ha--I did not need them anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, one minor flaw that only some people will notice...
Reviews.Author: Brian DeAngelis
Reviews.Content: I've had the 55 inch for a couple weeks now, and it's as beautiful as advertised and reviewed.There is one minor flaw I've noticed.  I don't know if this is the actual effect I'm seeing, but in some broadcasts, specifically hockey, when there is quick camera panning across the ice, if you pay close attention you'll see very faint vertical banding.  For most people I'm guessing you'll never notice because it's so faint.  But it is there, and I suppose that's the reason this TV doesn't cost 3 times as much.I don't want to make too big of a deal out of it, because even though I notice the flaw if I try to, it's not something that remotely makes me regret the purchase, even as someone who watches hockey a lot.

Reviews.Title: Cant quite give it a 5
Reviews.Author: C. Simons
Reviews.Content: Mostly i'm very happy with the set, and am keeping it.... my only complaint is i'm surprised at the angle of viewing that retains sharpness and contrast.  Im normally watching at a straight-on angle, so it's not an issue, but during Super Bowl, i was sitting in chair at about a 45 degree angle to TV, about 6 ft away from screen... picture was washed out and lacked sharpness.  lots and lots of ghosting of players feet.  if viewed straight (or nearly) on, it was perfection.  After looking online at reviews of various LED's, seems to just be nature of the beast?  As i seldom use that seating, i'm keeping it, as everything else i'm pleased with.I did notice a very thin neon green line going down right edge of screen... again, after researching it, found out (for my circumstance anyway.. seems to be several causes/fixes out there in HDTV-land) it was my picture settings.  16x9 picture size took care of it.. for now anyway?im in a medium lit room... very dark scenes are a bit hard to see, but i'm sure i can play with settings and tweak it to be better.  there is some reflection on screen from overhead light if you look for it, but nothing that cant easily be ignored (other than during those very dark scenes, lol).if sounds like i'm downgrading this tv, i'm not.  for the fantastic price it's a fantastic TV.  If i was willing to pay another $1000, MAYBE some of these issues would go away (i wouldnt have to buy a $100 AppleTV or BlueRay to stream Netflix for instance.. wow... an extra $900 and i'd have one less box to deal with).....  i'm happy overall.  but, i'm not a crazy video-audiophile techno-snob either... just an average viewer who wants a TV with a clear picture and realistic colors.. this does all that easily... unless you're within a 45 degree angle about 6 ft from screen.. then you WILL be disappointed if that's your normal viewing position)

Reviews.Title: 4 stars to be realistic
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: Well worth what I paid for 900 with tax and the extreamly long deliveryPicture is amazing after tweaking all the settings.. If u don't... U will have a screen that seems to be a little glitchyAmazons secure delivery took really long, but its a 55 inch tv with free delivery, kinda expected it. Took almost two weeks to get it delivered :( very upsetting. Not only did they take forever, they sent me two tvs by mistake? Maid sure I only kept one, #honest Abe-1 star for the delivery not the tv, enjoy it if u buy it. Hope this review was a help

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Fernando A. Chacon "FernPlant"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv about a month ago and when it finally came the delivery men opened it and BAM broken TV. Was disappointed, but I called Amazon directly and they quickly replaced it to arrive a couple days later. Finally got it and wow what a beautiful picture. 240p is amazing and the picture quality is amazing.  I have read that some ppl got bad luck with their tvs but in reality its tested tech. Like computers they can break randomly. In my opinion 1 year is sufficient time for a tv. I registered mine through Samsung.com and received an extra 5 months on this tv model.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: sassyash13
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I got it for a great deal! I did have to play with the brightness because it's hard to see dark scenes on the environment settings.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: Excellent size for the living room.  Picture quality is nice. Nice sound.Also playing Xbox 360 on this; graphics are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great picture. Amazing. Very good sound quality.
Reviews.Author: NEIL D. REIFF
Reviews.Content: This Tv Is far superior to a earlier Samsung LCD TV. The picture quality is amazing in its vibrancy of color. Highly recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Joe Bauer
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price. I already have a Sony, and I actually like the picture on the Samsung better

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Steven L Bilsky
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not as good as my less expensive LG that is a year old, my LG does not have the light around edge of the screen.

Reviews.Title: This tv is great for its price :)
Reviews.Author: Karla
Reviews.Content: This tv is nice but I wished it had an extra hdmi output and  better sound. But overall, it's worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and price.
Reviews.Author: lrz00
Reviews.Content: It is really a nice TV for the money. if you enjoy a realistic picture and color this is the one. perfect size for 15 X 14 room.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Big E
Reviews.Content: Just bought this TV on Black Thursday.  GREAT TV.  Samsung never fails to please.  Only thing I wouldn't mind seeing is a few more inputs on the back, but it has the standard setup that works for most everything. Picture is fantastic.  It's so clear at times I feel like I'm on set while they're filming, no joke.  It took a little getting used to the 1080p.  Almost felt like a "soap opera" camera effect.  I'd recommend this monster!

Reviews.Title: The name was not correct
Reviews.Author: danny drake
Reviews.Content: this TV is great.  however, the reason i purchased it was because it was labeled as having a 240Hzs refresh rate.  it is only 120HZs.  Amazon has since updated the label.  still a huge great looking TV.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Sandra J. Jensen "SJ"
Reviews.Content: I think the picture on this set is great quality and I do have to agree with others that the instruction sheet is a cheap fold out and hard to read.  Also the controller is cheap light weight and dinky.  But the control does seem sensitive and it really works quite well.  It is too bad that it isn't on a swivel like the LG set that is similar but otherwise I would recommend it for the wonderful picture.  Also the sound is pretty good and actually I was pleasantly surprised.  I would have given it 5 stars except for the cheap instructions and the dinky controller but picture wise I would highly recommend it.  I did buy from Amazon and was greatly impressed with their wonderful customer service! I love their free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Bets TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jaz.W
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv, its simple for my kids but tech savvy enough to satisfy me! I had a problem with the picture on my first delivery but the amazon staff quickly fixed that and a new one to me in no time!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Abe Hammersmith
Reviews.Content: After so many 3dtv commercials I finally decided to go into BestBuy and ask around. After 20 or so minutes a salesperson recommended me to go with this model samsung as I was happy with the previous 60" I purchased a few weeks back. This was for my upstairs spare room and I wanted the whole theatrical package and this definitely packs a punch. My favorite part is it's camera so I can use hand gestures to navigate through the options. And the best part is that it's an internet tv so I won't need my playstation 3 to stream netflix anymore!

Reviews.Title: Vertical Line on screen by day 2
Reviews.Author: StevieG
Reviews.Content: I zeroed in on this model and brand after spending quite some time analyzing the TV market and rates. Placed an order for 55" and received the same on April 3. Day 1 - was awesome. Loved the tv, picture is great. Day 2- A yellow vertical line popped up right in the middle of the screen. Guess its one of those things which can go wrong.I have now placed a request for a new one.

Reviews.Title: WOW what a picture
Reviews.Author: walloon
Reviews.Content: I am just blown away by the awesome color of this tv. It is all I expected and more. I am very satisfied in choosing Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: K. Johnson "The Glitchhawk"
Reviews.Content: going from a 42'' TV this thing is HUGE! and going from a 720p projector its like night and day. its nice and light(in both picture and weight), the colors really pop and it looks great on my wall.Pros:+Extremely Bright LED rated at 450cd/m, after looking everywhere for the brightness I finally ended up asking Samsung.+240hz Trumotion(maybe a con for some but I actually like the look of it)+4ms response time(another thing not listed anywhere). pretty great for a TV(in comparison to other TV's(8ms) vs a PC monitor(1~3ms high end or 5ms for low end)+Clear picture+Clear sound(just not amazing)Cons:-Button placement of the arrow keys confuses me compared to most remotes. but I will get use to it.-CEVA Delivery. ran into a whole mess of problems with them. from dragging dirt onto my carpet to just being downright rude. however amazon made it right in the end and held on to my respect for them(for amazon not CEVA).other:~TV is somewhat thick for a LED. Doesn't bother me but might bother some.~Don't expect much from the sound.~if CEVA gives you any problems BE SURE to tell amazon to help them improve their white glove service~in the past i have had problems with Samsung products, so i bought a 4yr Canopy 4-Year TV Protection Plan ($1000-$1250 LCD, LED, Plasma) with it, to cover my back for such a large purchase.in the end: Great purchase! should be well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent No Frills TV
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best TV I've owned. The picture quality is outstanding in HD. I've had other so called HD tv's and they don't come even close to this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Mel T
Reviews.Content: TV arrived within 3 days great picture and sound remote on small side superb customer service. value Samsung makes a great set

Reviews.Title: un55eh6001 best tv
Reviews.Author: 55eh6001 great picture
Reviews.Content: glad i didnt return it and gave it a 2nd chance how stupid of me nice looking tv after reading all the bad reviews on the 7100 model this is by far the best tv ever i read alot of good reviews on panasonic plasmas so i decided to go to best buy to see it for myself  butt somthing look rong really bad i notice that the panasonic look to dark and compared to my samsung eh556001 couldnt believe how bright and crips was the picture  so once again if u looking for a nice briliant piture this is it who cares about 3d or smart tv i oready have my ps3 makes my tv smarter then any higher end tvs

Reviews.Title: Quality Picture, great buying experince
Reviews.Author: derzal93
Reviews.Content: Great Picture, not all the bells and whistles, but not home enough for all that shit.  240 motion rate nice for sports and action movies.

Reviews.Title: What a beautiful picture!
Reviews.Author: K. Jones "fly guy"
Reviews.Content: Even though it was a hassle dealing with the vendor and the huge delay in the shipping process, once the TV arrived I was more than pleased. It has an amazing picture. I have satelite HDTV service and it literally looks like 3D tv without the goofy glasses. The tv is a bit skimpy on jacks to plug everything into it, but everything I need is plugged in and works just fine. The price was great and I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: PJB
Reviews.Content: TV is just what I wanted.  It has it's pros and cons but the pros outweight the cons.  Good picture, good color and the sound is best set on movie mode.  Don't need a sound bar if you leave it on this setting.  There is some shadowing when people are moving their hands, but not much. Thats about the only complaint I have about the TV itself.  Now the shipping was another story....it sucked.  It sat at the carriers for a week before they decided to bring it to me 2 hours away. I called and called and finally they brought it, a week late.  This is not Amazons fault though.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Not enought inputs
Reviews.Author: ALK "AK"
Reviews.Content: Let me just say that this is an awesome tv. $12 estimated usage cost per year, nice design, deep colors, basically everything one wants in a great TV. Menu and remote options are very responsive and overall this product would have 5 stars if not for lack of inputs. This model has 2 HDMI and some other standard stuff, for most users that'll be enough but if you have xbox/tivo/apple tv/something also then you will begin running out of inputs quickly and you will need to use some sort of home theater system. My previous tv had 4 HDMI inputs and that was better ... but considering you get 55' LED for this price it's probably small downside.Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Help hooking up WII system
Reviews.Author: JOELISA
Reviews.Content: We like the TV,but are having problems hooking up our WII gaming system. Can anyone out there help up? We have Directv and we did add a sound bar and subwoofer to the TV. We got that to work. We have added a RCA 4-Way AV Switcher With S-Video. We have plugged it in one of the ports and selected the port and nothing.  Tried to turn the game part on and nothing. Under tv there are other selections but it keeps saying nothing is connected.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!!!
Reviews.Author: L. Flake
Reviews.Content: I went through countless TVs, looking through the specs on each one, and choose this TV. When it was delivered, Amazon's delivery guy helped set it up to make sure it worked (thank you Amazon for providing a wonderful delivery guy who gave excellent service). I could not ask for a better picture! I feel like I am standing there watching them film everything. The movies and TV shows almost jump out of the screen because it looks so real and crisp! You cannot go wrong with a Samsung!! The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was because there are only 2 HDMI ports. In my research, though, there aren't many TVs out there that do have more than 2 HDMI ports.

Reviews.Title: Average TV
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Matteo
Reviews.Content: Average picture quality, average sound and worst of all the TV can't play a large MP4 on a USB stick ( 1.5GB MP4) using connect share which is the reason I purchased this TV.  This TV doesn't have enough memory to the play the above file. I contacted technical support and all they did was to refer me to the manual - would not answer my question if this TV has the processing power to play the above file size - Buy the SONY instead

Reviews.Title: Web browser on a non-smart TV?
Reviews.Author: SimpleWoman
Reviews.Content: Hello - I am buying this Samsung model UN65EH6000FXZA, which is a "non-smart" TV. Can anyone give ideas/ways one can use a web browser on this TV? Is attaching a laptop with wires to this TV and then using the tv as a display the only way? Looking for a wireless option ideally. Thanks in advance.

Reviews.Title: DOA - white band
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Sellick
Reviews.Content: This tv was dead right out of the box, with a vertical white band about 8 inches white down the screen. This isn't a backlight band - it's an area of white light only with no picture despite picture being on the rest of the screen. Will be returning this immediately.

Reviews.Title: product
Reviews.Author: shannon bobillot
Reviews.Content: this tv i had for not even a week and it does not even give a picture. the tv light for viewing is not working, it just flickers once in awhile.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: dom
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing and was worth every penny. Buy this tv or you will be seriously missing out on an amazing piece of equipment. Great picture, almost great audio and an altogether amazing viewing experience (55 in)P.S. Only complaint is that the tv seems to have a slight leftward tilt to it, but it could be an external factors.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jean Mascia
Reviews.Content: Samsung does not stand behind there product I now own a $2000 paperweight. The TV is only two years old

Reviews.Title: bad wifi reception
Reviews.Author: Yi Zhang
Reviews.Content: High end TVs mostly use receiver which provide more ports, that is not what I concern. I don't like its wifi reception. I complain that to samsung support and told them all laptop and pc are good in reception. Samsung agree their wifi equipment in tv is not as good as computer's ... don't know why ???

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I thought I would be smart buying a Samsung Smart TV... It isn't worth the money, since you cannot enjoy the so called Smart features like the internet access.Samsung doesn't care about updating the tv to the latest flash player version. That means after a little time you won't be able to watch any internet videos on your Samsung "Smart" TV using flash.I called Samsung and they rebuked me that I bought a TV and not a computer and asked me what I am expecting from Samsung.I am very disappointed since I had to pay so much money for "just" a simple TV.

Reviews.Title: so disappointed!!
Reviews.Author: Ray Noack
Reviews.Content: You never know what you are getting at first! It takes years to see what is missing in the product. Samsung refuses to get this TV to have the Amazon instant video viewing app. It is ridiculous and uncalled for. Next week I am consulting with  a customer on buying a flat screen TV. I will not be recommending  a Samsung!
